short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a download button to Gyazo images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies the process of downloading your Gyazo images and videos. With a new download button added to all assets, you can now easily download them with just one click, saving you time and hassle. Whether you use Gyazo for work or personal projects, this feature is a useful addition that streamlines your workflow.
